sqlMap.insert: insert into memory(memory_seq, memory_total, memory_using, memory_ip, server_code, memory_idle, memory_total_used) values(memory_seq.nextval, #memory_total#, #memory_using#, #memory_ip#, #server_code#, #memory_idle#, #memory_total_used#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT memory_total FROM memory WHERE memory_ip=#memory_ip# ORDER BY memory_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
